title: One Stone Ital Shack
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Pizza, Western, Buffet, Fast food, Juice bar, Take-out, Caribbean, Ital
description: Saint Johns branch of One Stone. Open-air eatery in between a wild garden area and a main road. Offers a selection of vegan lunch food, snacks, and fresh fruit drinks. Food is served from 11am, come early for the widest range. Daily ital dishes might include soya chunks, tofu, seitan, provisions, rice, spinach, cassi (local cactus), corn cakes, pie, chickpeas, lentils - all served with salad. Also offers wraps, roti, pizza, lasagna, pea balls, fritters, links (veggie sausage rolls), cakes, pudding.
